quote: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me.
author: David Bailey

quote: People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Acting is magical. Change your look and your attitude, and you can be anyone.
author: Alicia Witt

quote: Adopting the right attitude can convert a negative stress into a positive one.
author: Hans Selye

quote: Attitude determines the altitude of life.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: My attitude is, if someone's going to criticize me, tell me to my face.
author: Simon Cowell

quote: Some people say I have attitude - maybe I do... but I think you have to. You have to believe in yourself when no one else does - that makes you a winner right there.
author: Venus Williams

quote: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
author: Walter Scott

quote: Time plays a role in almost every decision. And some decisions define your attitude about time.
author: John Cale

quote: We cannot change our past. We can not change the fact that people act in a certain way. We can not change the inevitable. The only thing we can do is play on the one string we have, and that is our attitude.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: The attitude is very important. Because, your behavior radiates how you feel.
author: Lou Ferrigno

quote: A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.
author: Wade Boggs

quote: Reject your sense of injury and the injury itself disappears.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes.
author: William James

quote: The secret of genius is to carry the spirit of the child into old age, which means never losing your enthusiasm.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: Your living is determined not so much by what life brings to you as by the attitude you bring to life; not so much by what happens to you as by the way your mind looks at what happens.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of human freedoms - to choose one's attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one's own way.
author: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in little matters. Excellence is not an exception, it is a prevailing attitude.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Happiness is an attitude of mind, born of the simple determination to be happy under all outward circumstances.
author: J. Donald Walters

quote: Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.
author: John N. Mitchell

quote: Attitude is everything.
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If your ego starts out, 'I am important, I am big, I am special,' you're in for some disappointments when you look around at what we've discovered about the universe. No, you're not big. No, you're not. You're small in time and in space. And you have this frail vessel called the human body that's limited on Earth.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: It is in the character of very few men to honor without envy a friend who has prospered.
author: Aeschylus

quote: You know what's funny to me? Attitude.
author: Don Rickles

quote: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Wearing the correct dress for any occasion is a matter of good manners.
author: Loretta Young

quote: Surfers have the most attitude.
author: Shaun White

quote: Pink isn't just a color, it's an attitude!
author: Miley Cyrus

quote: I think it's my adventure, my trip, my journey, and I guess my attitude is, let the chips fall where they may.
author: Leonard Nimoy

quote: Cock your hat - angles are attitudes.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: The ideal attitude is to be physically loose and mentally tight.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Character is the result of two things: mental attitude and the way we spend our time.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: When you ain't got no money, you gotta get an attitude.
author: Richard Pryor

quote: Eagles come in all shapes and sizes, but you will recognize them chiefly by their attitudes.
author: E. F. Schumacher

quote: Attitudes are more important than facts.
author: George MacDonald

quote: Civilization is a method of living, an attitude of equal respect for all men.
author: Jane Addams

quote: It is not the body's posture, but the heart's attitude that counts when we pray.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Take the attitude of a student, never be too big to ask questions, never know too much to learn something new.
author: Og Mandino

quote: The meaning of things lies not in the things themselves, but in our attitude towards them.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: My attitude is that if you push me towards something that you think is a weakness, then I will turn that perceived weakness into a strength.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Having a positive mental attitude is asking how something can be done rather than saying it can't be done.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: But the attitude of faith is to let go, and become open to truth, whatever it might turn out to be.
author: Alan Watts

quote: Our future cannot depend on the government alone. The ultimate solutions lie in the attitudes and the actions of the American people.
author: Joe Biden

quote: Between stimulus and response, there is a space where we choose our response.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Bad attitudes will ruin your team.
author: Terry Bradshaw

quote: There is little difference in people, but that little difference makes a big difference. The little difference is attitude. The big difference is whether it is positive or negative.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: You live in the image you have of the world. Every one of us lives in a different world, with different space and different time.
author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

quote: Our environment, the world in which we live and work, is a mirror of our attitudes and expectations.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Most of us start out with a positive attitude and a plan to do our best.
author: Marilu Henner

quote: My attitudes have changed, but somebody would have to read all my books to find out how they have.
author: Irwin Shaw

quote: The biggest challenge is how to affect public attitudes and make people care.
author: Jim Fowler

quote: There are no menial jobs, only menial attitudes.
author: William J. Brennan, Jr.

quote: Good humor is one of the best articles of dress one can wear in society.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray
